where mem_num = #{memberNum}

update book set book_status = #{bookStatus} where book_num = #{bookNum}

mapper.delete: delete from book where mem_num = #{memberNum} and book_status = '결제대기중'
mapper.select: select b.book_num, gm.mem_num, store_num , theme_num, theme_time, people, price , deposit_price, final_price, coupon_num , book_status, b.group_num from book b join group_member gm on b.group_num = gm.group_num where b.group_num = #{groupNum} and gm.mem_num = #{memberNum}
